Generation VI.X: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
Generation VI.Y: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

Generation VII.Sun: The weakest of all Dragon-type Pokémon, it's unable to breathe if its skin dries out, so it sticks to shady places.
Generation VII.Moon: Its source of protection is its slimy, germ-laden mucous membrane. Anyone who touches it needs some thorough hand-washing.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It uses its horns to check out its surroundings. They're very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its body is mostly water. If it dries out, it will die, so it's always sitting with perfect stillness in the shade.

Generation VIII.Sword: Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if the weather becomes too arid. It's considered the weakest dragon Pokémon.
Generation VIII.Shield: Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into hiding. This is how they've survived.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon instantly becomes lethargic.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Most of a Goomy’s body is water. A membrane covers the whole Pokémon to prevent it from shriveling up in dry weather.
Generation IX.Violet: Goomy's horns are excellent sensory organs that cover all five of Goomy's senses. Goomy picks up on danger from the movement of the air.

Generation VII.Sun: Route 17 , Lush Jungle ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Moon: Route 17 , Lush Jungle ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Route 17 , Lush Jungle ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Route 17 , Lush Jungle ( SOS Battle in rain )
